txt.en:
'We have learned that the Orcs of Gathbúrz are led on the ground by a commander named Fikthrug, somewhere in Búrzkala.

'Alas, he himself is no more than a pawn of their masters in the tower, so it will not leave them leaderless, but if you can find and defeat this Orc it will be a significant blow to the Orcs' morale.

'Bûrzkala lies to the north of here. When you have completed this deed, return to me.'

'Fikthrug has fallen then? Good!

'He may be easily replaceable, but every time a powerful Orc-leader falls, it sets off a merry row of infighting and assassination among the officers beneath him while they sort out who will take his place.

'It is better that they spend their time fighting each other rather than us, I would say.'
'As long as Fikthrug remains, the forces of the Enemy here will be strong...he must be defeated!'
The Orc-garrison at Bûrzkala is commanded by a fearsome creature known as Fikthrug.
Fikthrug is at Bûrzkala, directly north of Thangúlhad.\n\nRodelleth has asked you to find and defeat the Orc-commander Fikthrug.
Rodelleth is at Thangúlhad in Gathbúrz, south of Búrzkala.\n\nYou should return to Rodelleth with news of your victory.
